content: I am so speechless at the shortsightedness of these privileged conservative old white men who for some reason can dare to TELL ME WHAT I CAN DO and what medical care I can get in my country??? Are you kidding me? I want to restrict their access as well, especially at the legislative level. You go ahead and tell me none of your privilege women haven’t seeked an abortion, birth control and yearly exams just so you arrogant men wouldn’t know. I have seen it. Witnessed it. Such disgusting behavior.
